verses.name: 2 Chronicles 8:1
verses.text: And it came to pass at the end of twenty years, wherein Solomon had built the house of the Lord, and his own house,

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 8:2
verses.text: That the cities which Huram had restored to Solomon, Solomon built them, and caused the children of Israel to dwell there.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 8:3
verses.text: And Solomon went to Hamath–zobah, and prevailed against it.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 8:4
verses.text: And he built Tadmor in the wilderness, and all the store cities, which he built in Hamath.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 8:5
verses.text: Also he built Beth–horon the upper, and Beth–horon the nether, fenced cities, with walls, gates, and bars;
